events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back.
Assigned to support agent Jane for handling the refund request promptly.
Hello, I'm Jane from customer support. I understand you want a refund due to receiving the wrong item.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number for verification?
Here is the photo of the incorrect product I received and my order number is 123456789. Please help.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund right away and send you a confirmation email shortly.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund offer. Looking forward to receiving confirmation soon.
The refund has been completed and you should receive the amount within 5 to 7 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund was successfully processed and no further issues were reported, the case is now closed. Thank you!
